item.title: Find in terminal
item.description: Find files from terminal [TOC] Several Useful Commonds 目录搜索: find fd 文本搜索: grep rg Find files find > find root_path -name '*.ext' > find root_path -name '*pattern_1*' fd > fd 'file' Find Word in Files grep > grep text file_name rg(ripgrep) > rg 'word'
